1. open.description: The opening price of the stock for the week

2. high.description: The highest price the stock reached during the week

3. low.description: The lowest price the stock reached during the week

4. close.description: The closing price of the stock for the week

5. adjusted close.description: The adjusted closing price that accounts for any corporate actions like stock splits

6. volume.description: The trading volume of the stock for the week

7. dividend amount.description: The amount of dividend paid per share during the week
